src:
V novi številki Primorskih novic preberite
07 Nov 2019, 19:47 by Spletno uredništvo

Avstrijski lastniki, ki so julija 2017 prevzeli Vinsko klet Vipava 1894, so z dobavitelji, prevzetim grozdjem in vinom, ki ga pridelajo, zadovoljni. Ob 125-letnici tradicije vipavske kleti prisegajo na razvoj in kakovost, zato tudi vlagajo v klet. Prodirajo na nove trge in širijo ponudbo vin višje kakovosti.



Foto: LEO CAHARIJA

Postajališče za avtodome je, na vrsti je brv
V Vrtojbi so odprli postajališče za avtodome, prvi konkretni projekt, ki ga je izvedlo čezmejno združenje EZTS GO. Tam naj bi sčasoma postavili še avtokamp.
Turizem odslej pod eno streho
V drugi polovici prihodnjega leta naj bi v okviru Območne razvojne agencije (ORA) začela delovati enota, ki bi skrbela za turizem vseh kraško-brkinskih občin.
Letališki gostje ostajajo po več dni
Konec oktobra se je tudi ponudba na letališču Bovec umirila, letala po razmehčani travnati stezi v slabem vremenu ne vzletajo. V letošnji sezoni so našteli več gostov, ki so ustvarili okoli 12.000 nočitev oziroma 2000 več kot lani.
Kam lahko potniki letijo z Brnika dober mesec po stečaju Adrie Airways?
Potniki so letos poleti z Brnika lahko leteli na 30 letališč, zdaj v zimskem voznem redu na 16. Slovenija dober mesec dni po propadu Adrie ni letalsko odrezana od sveta, hitro so prileteli novi prevozniki, dosedanji pa povečali letala in število prihodov.
Umrl nekaj trenutkov po trčenju
Kombinacija mokre ceste in hitrosti je bila usodna za 21-letnega mladeniča iz Račic.
Bo za dvojni umor sedel 30 let?
Pet mesecev po začetku se bo v ponedeljek končalo sojenje za dvojni umor v Krkavčah.
Čakajo analizo, kako trdno je dno pristanišča na Seči
Čeprav si je piranska občina zadala cilj, da bo do konca oktobra vložila prošnjo za gradbeno dovoljenje, s katerim želi, tudi s pomočjo evropskega denarja, obnoviti ribiško pristanišče na Seči, se to še ni zgodilo.
Mlinotest premočan za Žurd?
V petek prvi se obeta dvoboj najboljših primorskih ženskih rokometnih ekip v letošnji sezoni.
Tuje pero, njeno črnilo
Prevajalka Breda Biščak glas posoja drugim, a ko je treba, ga pogumno dvigne tudi sama.
Priloga 7. Val:
- 30 let od padca berlinskega zidu
- Silvana Šonc, direktorica sežanske bolnišnice: “Slovenija ne more in ne sme postati velik dom ostarelih!”
- Intervju: Matjaž Valant, dekan Fakultete za znanosti o okolju
text:
Read the new issue of Primorska News
07 Nov 2019, 19:47 by Web Editing

The Austrian owners who took over the Vipava Wine Cellar in 1894 in July 2017 are pleased with the suppliers, the grapes they have purchased and the wine they produce. To commemorate the 125th anniversary of the Vipava cellar tradition, they are committed to development and quality and therefore invest in the cellar. They are expanding into new markets and expanding the range of higher quality wines.



Photo: LEO CAHARIJA

The motorhome stop is the turnpike
A motorhome stop was opened in Vrtojba, the first concrete project implemented by the cross-border association EGTC GO. Eventually, they would set up a campsite.
Tourism is now under one roof
In the second half of next year, a unit will be set up within the Regional Development Agency (ORA) to take care of the tourism of all the municipalities of the Karst region.
Airport guests stay for several days
At the end of October, the offer at the Bovec airport calmed down and the planes did not take off on the soft grassy track in bad weather. This season, more guests are listed, making about 12,000 nights or 2000 more than last year.
Where can passengers fly from Brnik a good month after the bankruptcy of Adria Airways?
Passengers were allowed to fly from Brnik to 30 airports this summer, now in the winter timetable to 16. Slovenia has not been cut off from the world for a month after the collapse of Adria, new carriers have arrived quickly and the number of arrivals has increased so far.
Died moments after the collision
The combination of wet roads and speed was fatal for a 21-year-old young man from Racic.
Will he be 30 years old for a double murder?
Five months after the start, the double murder trial in Krkavce will end on Monday.
They are waiting for an analysis of how solid the seabed bottom is
Although the municipality of Piran has set itself the goal of applying for a building permit by the end of October, which, with the help of European money, seeks to rebuild the Seč fishing port, this has not yet happened.
Mlinotest too strong for Jourd?
On Friday, the first promises to be a duel of the best coastal women's handball teams of the season.
A foreign pen, its ink
Translator Breda Biščak lends the voice to others, but when needed, he courageously lifts it himself.
Annex 7. Wave:
- 30 years since the fall of the Berlin Wall
- Silvana Šonc, director of the Sežana Hospital: "Slovenia cannot and should not become a large nursing home!"
- Interview: Matjaz Valant, Dean of the Faculty of Environmental Sciences
